name: Rage Software Game Resource Package
summary: Learn about .XFS files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Rage Software used the XFS format in various games during the late 1990s and early 2000s until the company went defunct. While games no longer use the format, you may still encounter it in the installation directory of old Rage Software games like eRacer and Rage Rally.
For example, you can find XFS files in the "Cars" and "Tracks" folders in the following directory for the eRacer installation:
NOTE: Rage Software was formerly Rage Games.

instructions: You should not attempt to open XFS files since games automatically load them for gameplay. However, if you are looking to modify the files, you can extract their contents with the E-racer script.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
